column3: You now have access to the Aethernet.
Quick travel throughout the city can be achieved by simply placing your hand upon Aethernet shards.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in Gridania. The Blue Badger Gate and the Yellow Serpent Gate are now accessible as Aethernet destinations.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in Gridania. The Blue Badger Gate, the Yellow Serpent Gate, and the White Wolf Gate are now accessible as Aethernet destinations.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in Limsa Lominsa. The Zephyr Gate and the Tempest Gate are now accessible as Aethernet destinations.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in Ul'dah. The Gate of Nald, the Gate of Thal, and the Gate of the Sultana are now accessible as Aethernet destinations.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in the Manderville Gold Saucer.
You have attuned yourself to all the Aethernet shards in Ishgard. The Gates of Judgement are now accessible as an Aethernet destination.
